meta.content: Lost Hills Union School District is located in Lost Hills, California.

li.a: Get help with my IC Portal Account

div.marquee: ***Notice: School Closure Due To COVID-19 from March 18 through May 29, 2020*** Free Breakfast and Lunch from 10-11 AM @ 4 Locations. Trailer Park, Lamberson Apartments, Martin and Tulare & Blackwells Corner Remember to wash your hands, cover your cough, limit public gathering to 10 persons or less & be aware of social space Recuerde lavarse las manos, cubrirse la tos, limitar la reunión pública a 10 personas o menos y estar al tanto del espacio social
